name: CrystalBall Godot
description:
This is prototype made in Godot 3.2 beta 5. This game is created  to try Godot and compare the capabilities with Unreal and Unity.

I don't know if the Mac version works because I don't have one

The original game created on Unreal. There will be new updates and you can find more information there.
Original game: https://bodamat.itch.io/crystalball
